      • Serialized Fields

        • expiration
          long expiration
          The expiration time for JWT tokens, in seconds. This value is injected from the application property jwt.expiration. A default value (e.g., 86400 seconds = 24 hours) is provided if the property is not set.
        • secret
          String secret
          The secret key used for signing and verifying JWT tokens. This value is injected from the application property jwt.secret. A default value is provided if the property is not set. It is crucial that this secret is kept confidential and is strong.
